ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm. The only issue I remember with bard weapon procs was when the weapon proc ing would lock up your songs so you had to camp or zone to clear it.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Oct 11/00, John Tatsukawa <john@...> wrote:
>
> They do address bard issues when it's a high priority. Remember when our
> weapons weren't proc'ing anymore after one of their patches? They fixed
> that within a day I think.

Hmm. The only issue I remember with bard weapon procs was when the
weapon proc'ing would lock up your songs so you had to camp or zone to
clear it. (actually it was discovered rapidly clicking your hotkeys
would fix it but very few seemed to know about that trick)

That didn't get fixed for a couple of months after I first ran across
it.
